defeat() - Method in class game
calculates if the game has been won
dictionary - Class in <Unnamed>
class to create a dictionairy can be used to initiate a game class
dictionary(String) - Constructor for class dictionary
creates new dictionary initialized from the file .\multimedia\hangman_'dic_ID'.txt if it exists, if it does not the file is created from data collected at https://openlibrary.org/works/'dic_ID'.json

get_desc_value(JsonObject) - Method in class dictionary

H

hit - Variable in class game

I

InvalidCountException - Exception in <Unnamed>
Exception thrown when dictionairy being constructed contains duplicate words Will only be thrown when construsting from file.
InvalidCountException() - Constructor for exception InvalidCountException
 
InvalidRangeException - Exception in <Unnamed>
Exception thrown when dictionairy being constructed contains words with length less than 6 Will only be thrown when construsting from file.
InvalidRangeException() - Constructor for exception InvalidRangeException
 

L

life - Variable in class game
players remaining life if it drops to zero the game ends in defeat

M

make_move(char, int) - Method in class game
takes a guess from the player if the guess is correct it increases the players points by 5 points if it had a greater probability to be correct 0.6, 10 if probability greater than 0.4, 15 if probability greater than 0.25 and 30 probability lesser than 0.25 if the guess is wrong it decreases health by one and points by 15 recalculates probabilities given the new information returns true if the player guessed correctly and false otherwise

P

points - Variable in class game
players collected points if they drop below zero the game ends in defeat
print_found() - Method in class game
prints and returns the letters that have been guessed correctly with '_' filling for those that have yet to be guessed
propabilities - Variable in class game
array of propabilities that a letter (first index) has to appear on a specific spot in the word (second index) doesn't store real probabilities but the total number of times those letters appear in those spots

R

recalculate_probabilities(char, int) - Method in class game
recalculates the probabilities based on the players guess

T

tokenize(String) - Method in class dictionary
breaks data to individual words and returns them in a set.

U

UnbalncedException - Exception in <Unnamed>
Exception thrown when dictionairy being constructed has less 20% of it's words be of length 9 or greater
UnbalncedException(String) - Constructor for exception UnbalncedException
 
UndersizeException - Exception in <Unnamed>
Exception thrown when dictionairy being constructed has less than 20 words
UndersizeException() - Constructor for exception UndersizeException
 
url_handler(File, String) - Method in class dictionary
private function that handles dictionairy constraction from a json file pointed at by the url variable it expects the json to contain a field with the name "description" that is either a string or it contains a fied called "value" that is a string

V

victory() - Method in class game

W

word - Variable in class game

words - Variable in class dictionary
set of all words in the dictionairy
words - Variable in class game
set of all probable words given what the user has found
write_dic(File, String) - Method in class dictionary
writes dictionairy to file and save all valid words in words variable.
